A

AbstractFormatHandler - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
Abstract base class for FormatHandler objects that import/export directory entries to/from LDAP directory servers in LDIF and DSML format.
AbstractFormatHandler() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractFormatHandler
 

C

close() - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatReader
Close the reader but not the underlying input stream.
close() - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatWriter
Close the writer but not the underlying output stream.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
This package defines the API and base classes for the objects that are used to import or export LDAP directory entries to or from DSML and LDIF file formats.
createWriter(OutputStream, FormatLogger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractFormatHandler
Create a writer that formats the directory entry before writing it to the output stream.

D

dump(LDAPInterface, String, String, OutputStream, FormatLogger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractFormatHandler
Dump the results of a search against the LDAP directory server to an output stream.
dump(LDAPInterface, String, String, OutputStream, FormatLogger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatHandler
Dump the results of a search against the LDAP directory server to an output stream.

F

FormatHandler - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
The interface that is implemented by objects that handle the DSML and LDIF file formats.
FormatLogger - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
The API used by FormatHandler, FormatReader and FormatWriter implementations to log information and error messages.
FormatReader - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
Implemented by objects that read change records from DSML or LDIF files.
FormatWriter - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
Implemented by objects that write directory entries to DSML or LDIF files.

L

load(LDAPInterface, InputStream, boolean, FormatLogger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractFormatHandler
Reads directory entries from the input stream and loads them in the LDAP directory server.
load(LDAPInterface, InputStream, boolean, FormatLogger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatHandler
Reads directory entries from the input stream and loads them in the LDAP directory server.
logError(String) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatLogger
Write an error message to the log file.
logError(String, Throwable) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatLogger
Write an error message with an exception stack trace to the log file.
logInfo(String) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatLogger
Write an information message to the log file.

N

nextRecord() - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatReader
Read the next change record from the underlying input stream.

O

openReader(InputStream, FormatLogger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractFormatHandler
Create a reader to parse the directory entries as they are read from the input stream.

P

printEntry(Entry) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.FormatWriter
Write the directory entry to the underlying output stream in the appropriate format.
